    CONTACT ME

Digital Data Done Delightfully

Hi! And welcome to my *new* site! I am a Data Scientist with an insatiable appetite for information, and a knack for optimizing websites. When I’m not geekin’ out I can be found exploring the city I call home or traveling somewhere around the globe.

By day I am a Data Scientist at Google, helping companies grow their businesses through smarter Digital Marketing. From more than 7+ years of Academic studies & research and over 15 years of professional experience, I have amassed quite a collection of technical skills. You can view all of them on my services page. Feel free also to see these skills in action by checking out my CV

My research interests includes Predictive Analytics, Data Mining, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence. If you’d like to in read some of my posts, check out my blog page. I have interests that span from cooking and tasting new foods to deep sea fishing, snorkeling, mountain climbing, squirrel suit diving, and…well that’s enough for now. My favorite teams are the NY Yankees, Buffalo Sabres, and of course, the Buffalo Bills. I also am blessed with a beautiful wife and amazing daughter – pics coming soon! 

Checkout some of my links for more information or my blog to stay current, or feel free to drop me a line. Hope to see you back real soon!

Tony

ABOUT ME

Tony DiLoreto is one part mathematician, one part data guru, and one part adventurer. I can normally be found hacking away, on top of the slopes, or above the skies. Contact Me to chat more about partnerships, board membership, volunteering, or to geek out.
